    • Method Detail

      • createQuery

        public static java.lang.String createQuery(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String author,
                           java.lang.String description)
        This method is called to construct the String object that will be the search query sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        title - The title field of the search.
        author - The author field of the search.
        description - The description field of the search.
        Returns:
        The JSON String that is the query to be sent to ElasticSearch.
